FuncDef: The display tunnel active-info command displays information about an MPLS TE LSP over which traffic is forwarded.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type of an interface.
The value is the Enumerated type. It can only be Tunnel.

Specifies the number of an interface.
-

Specifies a slot ID.
The value is a string of 0 to 16 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the name of a tunnel.
The value is a string of 1 to 255 characters.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display tunnel active-info interface Tunnel 0 slot 1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view the MPLS TE LSP over which traffic is forwarded, run the display tunnel active-info command.
